name: Mosque
description: Produces Scholars. The first Mosque constructed provides a Scholar. Starting in the Castle Age (III), Scholars can deposit Relics in this building to generate Gold.
descriptionCN: 生产学者。您建造的第一间清真寺附带一位学者。从城堡时代 (第三时代) 开始，学者可将圣物存放在这座建筑来产生黄金。
influences: The research rate of buildings within influence of a Mosque, Madrasa, or Dock is increased for each garrisoned Scholar. Research speeds are boosted globally for each Scholar garrisoned in these buildings.
